MV_MM_UniqueMapViewer.label: Unique map viewer
MV_MM_UniqueMapViewer.desc: Enables to have a single map viewer.

MV_MM_MultipleMapViewer.label: Multiple map viewer
MV_MM_MultipleMapViewer.desc: Enables to have multiple map viewers.

MV_MS_GeoServer.label: GeoServer
MV_MS_GeoServer.desc: Uses GeoServer (open-source server for spatial data management) as map server

MV_MS_GeoJSON.label: GeoJSON
MV_MS_GeoJSON.desc: Uses GeoJSON (format for representing geographic elements) as a map server.

MV_MS_GJ_Paginated.label: Paginated GeoJSON layers
MV_MS_GJ_Paginated.desc: Enables pagination of layers in GeoJSON

MV_MS_GJ_Cached.label: Cached GeoJSON layers
MV_MS_GJ_Cached.desc: Enables caching of layers in GeoJSON

MV_T_ZoomWindow.label: Zoom to a region
MV_T_ZoomWindow.desc: Enables zooming to a region on the map.

MV_T_Export.label: Export Map
MV_T_Export.desc: Export current view of the map

MV_LayerManagement.label: Layer Management
MV_LayerManagement.desc: Enables to manage the layers displayed on the map

MV_LM_BaseLayerSelector.label: Base Layer Selector
MV_LM_BaseLayerSelector.desc: Enables to select the base layers.

MV_LM_Order.label: Order Layers
MV_LM_Order.desc: Enables to add an overlay order of the layers

MV_LM_CenterViewOnLayer.label: Center View on Layer
MV_LM_CenterViewOnLayer.desc: Enables to center a view on a specific layer

MV_LM_HideLayer.label: Show/Hide Layers
MV_LM_HideLayer.desc: Enables you to select whether you want to show or hide each layer of the map.

MV_LM_Opacity.label: Change Layer Opacity
MV_LM_Opacity.desc: Enables you to change the opacity of the colored surface of the layers

MV_LM_Style.label: Change Layer Style
MV_LM_Style.desc: Allows to add custom styles to layers

UM_R_ByAdmin.label: Registration by Admin
UM_R_ByAdmin.desc: Registration of new users is done by administrator user.

UM_R_Anonymous.label: Anonymous Registration
UM_R_Anonymous.desc: An anonymous user can perform the registration in the application by himself

UM_A_RememberPass.label: Remember Password
UM_A_RememberPass.desc: Enables the browser to remember the user's password.

UM_A_RecoverPass.label: Recover Password
UM_A_RecoverPass.desc: Enables password recovery option for registered users.
